domain.editDisabled: Website domain can be changed every 15 minutes.

labelInfo.useIpns: IPNS is a feature of the IPFS that allows a consistent address to be used even when the content changes. This means you can share the same address, and any updates to the content won't require a new address.

status.10: Invalid, domain is not pointing to Apillon IP

review.confirm: Proceed with Website Deployment, I'll wait
content: Deployments of websites on the Free Plan undergo security checks to prevent phishing attempts and other malicious activities. While we typically review websites promptly, please note that it may take up to 24 hours. Once approved, your website will be accessible through our IPFS gateway.
Consider upgrading to one of our paid plans for immediate deployment without the security check delay.
review.title: Free Plan Website Review by Apillon

website.deleteConfirm: Are you sure that you want to delete selected website?
website.name: Website name

deploy.empty-info: Connect Github repository to enable Continuous Deployment for this website

env-vars.success-save: Environment variables have been saved successfully
env-vars.error-empty: Variable key and value can't be empty

hosting.clearAllFiles: Do you want to remove all files?
hosting.clearAllWarn: With this action you will erase all files. To deploy new version to preview, you will have to upload whole website.

hosting.github-connected-notice: You have successfully connected your GitHub account.
hosting.github-disconnected-notice: You have successfully disconnected your GitHub account.
hosting.ipnsInfo: It may take up to 5 minutes for the changes to become visible after the deployment has been completed.
